messages.message:
Hi team. We had an ask from a large prospective client to show what models were used in any run. Do we have a feature already scoped or implemented to add this kind of metadata? They would need any of the models used for field extractions, classifications, summarizations, etc. in analyze and automate contexts.
• LLM model(s) and specific versions used
• OCR model and specific version used
• Any DL model and version (table extraction)
• Any translate model/image/version
• Nice to have: ability to tag results with external models integrated through REST calls
If not, I'll get a PFR open.
